Articles.Content:
Take a space craft that you use often I don't care if it is an ssto or inline booster design just do something wacky that you never would have dreamed the vehicle could do. The crazyer the better the person who discovers the most cool things about their ship wins. Pictures help with the judging process. No mods except for mechjeb. Just discover the true potential of you designes.

Edited May 10, 2016 by Buzz light fear
